snippet.title: Cosmic Cursor - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Cosmic Cursor is an arcade roguelike that combines kinetic melee-based combat with a dynamic bullet hell. Use the cursor to control a vast array of ships and survive increasingly complex enemy swarms as you battle through the cosmos.

Wishlist on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2611750/Cosmic_Cursor/

#Gamedev #indiedev #steam #gameplay #announcement
